channel.title: I need help changing the gen shop buy %
channel.description:
Like if the item costs 2,000,000 to buy from shop and if someone sells it to the shop it gives them like 1,000,000 so looks like they only get 50%. I want to lower that to like 25% or even lower because people are getting millions of coins on my server from selling to gen shop.
Thanks

Wierd
